scripts.test:user-management: newman run collections/01_User_Management.postman_collection.json -e configs/qa_postman_environment.json -g configs/workspace.postman_globals.json --reporters cli,htmlextra,junit --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/user-management-report.html --reporter-junit-export reports/user-management-results.xml
scripts.test:authentication: newman run collections/02_Authentication.postman_collection.json -e configs/qa_postman_environment.json -g configs/workspace.postman_globals.json --reporters cli,htmlextra,junit --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/authentication-report.html --reporter-junit-export reports/authentication-results.xml
